name: Atari Go
short_description: Go, also known as Weiqi and Enchi, is an ancient Chinese board game sometimes called "Chinese Chess". As a player and C# developer, I want to make a C#-based Go engine for multiplayer Go, hopefully crossplatform, with full lobby features.
